title: Whemever someone claims Diana is OP
body:
It's _**always**_ followed by some illogical statement as to why she's op.

"Diana is op, Guinsoo's is too good on her!", "Diana is op, she can one-shot!"

It's just hysterical the amount of prejudice is given towards us Diana mains. You can negate *all* of her damage by dodging a *single* skillshot. Build MR and she's even more useless. If you can't, don't come on these boards and vent about how broken she is because I can assure you she isn't. This goes out to those **"Diana iz assassin but too tanky pls nerf"** comments. 



**She's. Not. Even. an. assassin.**

i am adc main and if i see a diana ganking my lane and im far from turret i know i should run very fast or i die.
it happens. peace.
when someone whine, mute
We're in a 20 minute game Snowball meta, a jungler that can't gank for 6 minutes has just lost their team the game (in higher elo)

She's just like a Zoe to me: fail to dodge one 6 second skillshot, get one-shoted. And she does it even without hitting it. After lvl 6 she is very braindead just like an Akali. You don't feel outplayed at all when a Diana kills you, she just kills you with sheer overwhelming force.
Also for a "Diver" she is very mobile and bursty but doesn't really build any sustain yet survives longer than others with her amount of mobility.

But she doesn't have mobility. She has a gap closer, yes, but what good is that when she hits level 18 and the enemy team can hard cc her and shut her down? At least akali has her W which can help her escape once she's in. Diana's combo is braindead, but if the enemy team have half a bronze brain, they'll make it super hard for you to even dive in without getting murdered. THAT'S why Diana sucks. 

She needs a rework. Either turn her into a true Fighter and give her more sustain (like xin), OR turn her into an assassin and give her an escape. It isn't FUN for people playing against a Diana to get one-shot helplessly, and it isn't fair for Diana players to have to play a champion who is used as an assassin, but has a kit like a Fighter. 

Diana's kit is like building full Lethality on Xin. You will be able to oneshot anyone without giving them counterplay, but what use is that when you have little sustain and 0 escape?
